alarms.description: S1 link to MME-01 is down. No communication with core network.
alarms.impact: Cell is offline. All users disconnected from CELL-2B.

alarms.description: Cell is operationally disabled due to an underlying critical fault.
alarms.impact: No service available for users in this coverage area.

alarms.description: VSWR on antenna port 2 is 1.8. Threshold is 1.5. Potential degradation.
alarms.impact: Reduced signal quality. May cause service degradation.

alarms.description: Baseband unit temperature is 68°C. Warning threshold is 65°C.
alarms.impact: Equipment may shut down if temperature continues to rise.
